summary: I was rewatching samedi 9:17, you know as you do because why not, and I think there needs to be a prediction for Axel to keep...
question: I was rewatching samedi 9:17, you know as you do because why not, and I think there needs to be a prediction for Axel to keep his hair down and messy like that because damn.
answer:
Damn, indeed.

I’m right there with you. The only two hairstyles I like on Axel (so far) is down and messy, like when Maxence runs his hands through it, andd the way that it was styled when he did that radio interview 💓

summary: This has nothing to do with skam france (sorry) but there's a series called My Mad Fat Diary that all of you need to watch!!...
question: This has nothing to do with skam france (sorry) but there's a series called My Mad Fat Diary that all of you need to watch!! It's completely different but it does deal with a lot of the same things - friends, love, mental illness etc. It might be a bit hard to follow in terms of Britishness lol but it made me feel the way skam does now and I relate to it so much <3
answer: I’ve watched it live & i loved it. Also their soundtrack was so good. Go watch it !!!!

reblog.comment: I’ve watched it live & i loved it. Also their soundtrack was so good. Go watch it !!!!

trail.content_raw: I’ve watched it live & i loved it. Also their soundtrack was so good. Go watch it !!!!
